_header: Diabolus through pride of heart and heaviness
_description: Four enemies of salvation — two couplets in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Diabolus þoru pride of herte & heynesseCaro
                    with lust likingge & vnclennesseMundus with is wrenchis & is
                    wellis ȝerningge& malus homo with enuie wrau werd &
                    bacbitingge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 19.
